title: No visible mouse in game
body: Hi so there have been 4 or 5 times tonight where I have entered a game and I cannot see the cursor. I can see when it hovers something and that lights up but no cursor. To get around this I have had to turn my computer off but I have gotten AFK warnings because of this. What can I do to fix this so I don't get the 5 minute game delay?

replies.body:
You may have a background application trying to draw over League and may be causing this issue. I strongly recommend [**performing a clean boot**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting#wq3) to ensure this isn't the case.

Let me know if this caused any change.
